sentences.sContent: Gothic tattoos run along her back, and deep knife scars trace her shoulder.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gothic tattoos run along her back, and deep knife scars trace her shoulder.
sentences.sCn: 她的背上布满了哥特式纹身，肩头上有深深的刀疤。

trans.tranOther: the Gothic style of building was common in Western Europe between the 12th and 16th centuries and included tall pointed  arches  and windows and tall  pillars
